idea.title: Coda Aurora Initiative
idea.notes:
Launch a living product atlas that forecasts adoption, sentiment, and risk across every feature in flight.

Goals:
- Illuminate dark corners of the roadmap with realtime telemetry.
- Give PMs and agents the same source of truth.
- Gradually replace static status reports with actionable stories.

features.title: Telemetry Telescope
features.notes: Stream usage, trust signals, and friction events into a single viewport for PMs and agents.
features.detail:
### Acceptance Criteria
- Merge existing PostHog dashboards with analytics events into one timeline.
- Add weighted severity tags so agents can triage without leaving the UI.
- Support 90 day lookback with daily aggregation under 150ms.

features.title: Field Guide Narratives
features.notes: Auto-summarise feature health and next steps so stakeholders can read one page per week.
features.detail:
### Narrative Template
- Key metric pulse (adoption, NPS, latency).
- Story beats authored by agents (headline + risk + next experiment).
- Embedded Loom or screenshot for visual context.

features.title: Signal Flare Automations
features.notes: Trigger Slack + email nudges when confidence collapses, when an experiment wins, or when adoption crosses milestones.
features.detail:
### Rules
- Confidence < 0.45 for 3 days: open an incident card + ping #aurora-ops.
- Adoption milestone: send celebratory digest and link to narrative page.
- Experiment declared winner: send playbook snippet to agents.

features.title: Roadmap Compass
features.notes: Visualise how Aurora’s insights shift investment per theme, with breadcrumbs back to agent tasks.
features.detail:
### Compass Tile
- Quadrant view: investment vs. confidence.
- Click-through to backlog filtered by agent or owner.
- Export to JSON for Specify so automation stays in sync.
